attributes.action: make May 19th the j-ho national holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This day should be a widely distinguished and celebrated day. We feel that these two individuals, Hodan and Jamie deserve gratitude and remembrance for there sheer comedic and joyous value. They have provided our nation with unforgettable memories. Their personalities, characteristics and wittiness should be imprinted into our society and history.
